DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate efficacy safety 12 week treatment Ferrous ( II ) Glycine Sulphate Complex comparison Polyferose capsule Chinese subject manifest Iron Deficiency Anemia .
DOC.brief_title: A Double-blind , Double-dummy , Parallel , Active-controlled , Randomized Trial Evaluate Efficacy & Safety Anemia Subjects
DOC.criteria: An iron deficiency anemia patient Serum Ferritin < 12 ng/mL , serum Hbvalues > 60 < 120 g/L male , < 110 g/L female With Malabsorption Syndrome With history Thalassemia Sickle Cell Anemia With untreated concurrent Vitamin B12 Folate deficiency Baseline
